data.eml:eml: Cluzobra matilei sp. n. from French Guyana, with notes on congeners (Diptera: Mycetophilidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kurina, Olavi (2008): Cluzobra matilei sp. n. from French Guyana, with notes on congeners (Diptera: Mycetophilidae). Zootaxa 1874: 63-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.274482
